data.comment: The big names in today's match at Orange Velodrome have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 1, Monaco have a dangerous throw-in.
Monaco's Wissam Ben Yedder misses with an attempt on goal.
Marseille have a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Benoit Millot awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, Benoit Millot signals a Marseille throw-in in Monaco's half.
Marseille to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Florian Thauvin scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
That's a fine assist from Dario Benedetto.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 8, Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in Monaco.
Benoit Millot awards Marseille a goal kick.
It's now 2-0 in Marseille as Dario Benedetto scores for Marseille.
In the minute 13, Florian Thauvin with an assist there.
Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Monaco.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Monaco in the half of Marseille.
Monaco advance rapidly upfield but Benoit Millot blows for offside.
Throw-in for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
In the minute 17, Can Marseille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
Benoit Millot awards the away team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Marseille.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Marseille in the half of Monaco.
Throw-in for Marseille in the half of Monaco.
Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 19, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Monaco at Orange Velodrome.
Throw-in for Monaco at Orange Velodrome.
In the minute 20, Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
In Marseille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 22, Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
Free kick Monaco.
Morgan Sanson is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 24, Pape Alassane Gueye is replacing Morgan Sanson for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
Free kick Monaco.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
Monacoâ€™s Ruben Aguilar is on his feet again at Orange Velodrome.
In the minute 28, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ruben Aguilar for Monaco who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
At Orange Velodrome, Monaco are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
Free kick for Marseille in the half of Monaco.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, Benoit Millot signals a Marseille throw-in in Monaco's half.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Monaco.
In Marseille Monaco drive forward through Benoit Badiashile. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 34, Monaco have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Throw-in Monaco.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Monaco at Orange Velodrome.
Monaco's Aurelien Tchouameni gets in a shot on goal at Orange Velodrome. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Marseille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 38, Goal kick for Monaco at Orange Velodrome.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Monaco close to the penalty box.
Monaco to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
In the minute 41, Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
In the minute 43, Throw-in high up the field for Monaco in Marseille.
Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Monaco's Youssouf Fofana has been booked in Marseille.
In the minute 44, In Marseille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Monaco in the half of Marseille.
Marseille needs to be cautious. Monaco have an attacking throw-in.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Monaco.
Niko Kovac is making the team's first substitution at Orange Velodrome with Guillermo Maripan replacing Benoit Badiashile.
Benoit Millot awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
Throw-in for Monaco in the half of Marseille.
Free kick Monaco.
In the minute 51, Monaco's Kevin Volland goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Marseille.
Benoit Millot awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 54, Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Marseille.
Benoit Millot signals a throw-in for Monaco, close to Marseille's area.
Monaco to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
In the minute 58, In Marseille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The away team have replaced Kevin Volland with Stevan Jovetic. This is the second substitution made today by Niko Kovac.
Niko Kovac (Monaco) is making a third substitution, with Pietro Pellegri replacing Gelson Martins.
In the minute 59, Marseille's Florian Thauvin breaks free at Orange Velodrome. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Monaco have a goal kick.
In Marseille Monaco attack through Pietro Pellegri. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 60, Benoit Millot awards Marseille a goal kick.
Throw-in Marseille.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 62, Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
Benoit Millot signals a Monaco throw-in in Marseille's half.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Monaco in the half of Marseille.
Axel Disasi (Monaco) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
In the minute 65, Andre Villas-Boas (Marseille) is making a second substitution, with Valere Germain replacing Mickael Cuisance.
In Marseille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Boubacar Kamara (Marseille) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
In the minute 67, Axel Disasi is booked for the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, It's a goal kick for the home team in Marseille.
Can Monaco capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Marseille's half?
The away team replace Caio Henrique with Fode Toure.
In the minute 70, Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Marseille close to the penalty box.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Monaco at Orange Velodrome.
Marseille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marseille push upfield but Benoit Millot quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 75, Monaco advance rapidly upfield but Benoit Millot blows for offside.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Monaco.
Boubacar Kamara (Marseille) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 76, Niko Kovac is making the team's fifth substitution at Orange Velodrome with Enzo Millot replacing Aurelien Tchouameni.
Monaco have been awarded a penalty...
Benoit Millot signals a Monaco throw-in in Marseille's half.
In the minute 77, Florian Thauvin (Marseille) has received a yellow card from Benoit Millot.
Goal! Monaco now trail just 2-1 thanks to a penalty from Wissam Ben Yedder.
Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 83, Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
Benoit Millot awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Monaco.
In the minute 84, In Marseille, Monaco push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Monaco in the half of Marseille.
Throw-in for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
In the minute 87, The home team have replaced Dario Benedetto with Leonardo Balerdi. This is the third substitution made today by Andre Villas-Boas.
Luis Henrique is replacing Florian Thauvin for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
Monaco to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
In the minute 88, Throw-in high up the field for Monaco in Marseille.
Monaco needs to be cautious. Marseille have an attacking throw-in.
Enzo Millot of Monaco smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Monaco to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Monaco.
Enzo Millot (Monaco) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Marseille have a goal kick.
Benoit Millot blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
At Orange Velodrome, Valere Germain has been yellow-carded for the home team.
